[Page Title: Anson Restaurant]

Anson Restaurant 
Scroll

ANSON RESTAURANT
Celebrated for almost three decades... 
In its thoughtful approach to local ingredients, Anson Restaurant, has always taken the best of what historic Charleston's seasons have to offer & crafted them into innovative turns on traditional Southern cuisine.
Casual, quality cuisine, served Tuesday through Saturday, beginning at 5 p.m. Additional holiday hours for 2025 Open Sunday 12.28 and Monday 12.29, 5-9PM 
Make a reservation

(843) 577-0551

SOCIAL MEDIA
